statements: SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Products INNER JOIN Inventory ON Products.product_id = Inventory.product_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM Products p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
-- Select all columns from Products table in descending order of product_id
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
-- Select product_id and product_name from Products where price is greater than 100
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products WHERE price > 100;
-- Select product_name, quantity, and last_stocked_date from Inventory where quantity is less than 10
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_stocked_date FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
-- Select product_name, quantity, and price from Products and Inventory tables with a join on product_id
SELECT p.product_name, i.quantity, p.price FROM Products p INNER JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id;
-- Select product_name, quantity, and last_stocked_date from Inventory where last_stocked_date is not null
SELECT p.product_name, i.quantity, i.last_stocked_date FROM Products p INNER JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE i.last_stocked_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_update FROM Inventory ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT report_type, report_date, report_details FROM Reports WHERE report_type = 'Sales' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT report_type FROM Reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Products JOIN Inventory ON Products.product_id = Inventory.product_id WHERE quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM Inventory INNER JOIN Products ON Inventory.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT report_date, report_type FROM Reports INNER JOIN Products ON Reports.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE report_type = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, category FROM Products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE category = 'Clothing' AND product_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT p.product_name, i.quantity, r.generate_date FROM Products p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN Reports r ON i.quantity < 10 AND r.generate_date = CURDATE()
SELECT p.product_name, s.average_daily_sales FROM Products p LEFT JOIN SlowMovingItems s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.average_daily_sales < 5 ORDER BY p.product_name ASC
SELECT p.product_name, o.reason FROM Products p RIGHT JOIN OutOfStockItems o ON p.product_id = o.product_id AND o.notification_sent = TRUE
